channel.title: Prevent a source from nulling?
channel.description:
I've had two separate sources null on me, and was just wondering if anyone knows how to fix/prevent it from happening? It doesn't happen right away, but only after a few days of the server running.
Basically, it disconnects everbody and then when you log back in it flashes the welcome screen, you cant move, and then you dc again. It ruins the entire server. The server cmd window keeps saying
null null null null
constantly.
Any ideas?
EDIT: Ok I compiled again using Xlint, and I got these errors. I could really use some helping solving this.
[code]warning: [path] bad path element "CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bi n": no such file or directory warning: [path] bad path element "%CLASSPATH%": no such file or directory clickingMost.java:815: warning: [fallthrough] possible fall-through into case case 40122: ^ clickingMost.java:2119: warning: [fallthrough] possible fall-through into case case 4143: // Lumbridge, aka home ^ client.java:666: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int aBonus += (int) (playerBonus[1] / 20); ^ client.java:670: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int dBonus += (int) (AttackingOn2.playerBonus[6] / 20); ^ client.java:3604: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int aBonus += (int) (playerBonus[1] / 20); ^ client.java:3608: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int dBonus += (int) (AttackingOn2.playerBonus[6] / 20); ^ client.java:3634: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int aBonus += (int) (playerBonus[1] / 20); ^ client.java:3638: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int dBonus += (int) (AttackingOn2.playerBonus[6] / 20); ^ client.java:6825: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); ^ client.java:6829: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); ^ client.java:6833: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); ^ client.java:6839: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); ^ client.java:7424: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7424: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7427: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7427: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7430: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7430: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); ^ client.java:7432: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.1); ^ client.java:7450: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus * Range) * 0.00075)); ^ client.java:7450: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus * Range) * 0.00075)); ^ client.java:7453: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus) * 0.00025)); ^ client.java:7453: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double MaxHit += (double) (1.35 + (double) ((double) (RngBonus) * 0.00025)); ^ client.java:9625: warning: [cast] redundant cast to client client castOn = (client) f; // s pecific player's client ^ client.java:11927: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int sendQuest(dhide[(int) (i / 2)], soon[i]); ^ client.java:11930: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int sendQuest(cost[(int) (i / 2)], soon[i]); ^ client.java:14171: warning: [fallthrough] possible fall-through into case case 164: ^ client.java:14376: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int int UsedOn = (int) (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffe r, 3, 1) / 1000); ^ client.java:16046: warning: [fallthrough] possible fall-through into case case 75: ^ client.java:20861: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int index2 = (int) (i / 4); ^ client.java:20882: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int cExp = (int) (cExp * 8); ^ client.java:21917: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int attackTimer = (int) ((woodcuttin g[0] + 10) - WCAxe); ^ NPCHandler.java:945: warning: [cast] redundant cast to double if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((doubl e) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5))) { ^ NPCHandler.java:2276: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int newNPC.MaxHit = (int)(combatLevel[npcType] / 3); ^ NPCHandler.java:2314: warning: [cast] redundant cast to int newNPC.MaxHit = (int)(combatLevel[npcType] / 3); ^ 37 warnings Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Prevent a source from nulling?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Lin:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422269.0.html I posted a tutorial that explains how to fix it.

When I use that tutorial it doesn’t let me login. It starts to log me in but immediately takes me back to the login screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Prevent a source from nulling?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

I’ve had two separate sources null on me, and was just wondering if anyone knows how to fix/prevent it from happening? It doesn’t happen right away, but only after a few days of the server running.

Basically, it disconnects everbody and then when you log back in it flashes the welcome screen, you cant move, and then you dc again. It ruins the entire server. The server cmd window keeps saying

null
null
null
null

constantly.

Any ideas?
